titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for the rotation of membership on the Committee on Appropriations.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Amends rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit any Representative from serving as a member of the Committee on Appropriations during more than three Congresses in any period of five successive Congresses. Requires that selections to such committee be made without regard to seniority.
